task.title: Superhero Muffins
task.shortdesc: Prep time: 12-15 minutes. Cook time: 25-35 minutes. Makes 12 muffins.

ul.li: 3 tablespoons ground flax seed and 9 tablespoons water

step.cmd: Preheat the oven to 350 F. Line a 12-cup standard muffin tin with paper muffin cups.
In a large bowl, combine the almond meal, oats, cinnamon, nutmeg, baking soda, salt, walnuts, and raisins.
In a separate bowl, mix together the eggs, zucchini, carrots, butter, maple syrup, and vanilla. Add the dry ingredients, mixing until just combined. The batter will be thick.
In a separate bowl, mix together the flax seed and water, zucchini, carrots, margarine, maple syrup, and vanilla. Add the dry ingredients, mixing until just combined. The batter will be thick.
Spoon the batter into the muffin cups, filling each to the brim. Bake until the muffins are nicely browned on the top, about 25-35 minutes.
